methods.name: requestAuthorization

parameters.name: authOptions
parameters.docs: These define which access we need. Possible Options include ['calories', 'stairs', 'activity', 'steps', 'distance', 'duration', 'weight'].

tags.name: param
tags.text: authOptions These define which access we need. Possible Options include ['calories', 'stairs', 'activity', 'steps', 'distance', 'duration', 'weight'].

methods.docs: This functions will open the iOS Screen to let users choose their permissions. Keep in mind as developers, if the access has been denied by the user we will have no way of knowing - the query results will instead just be empty arrays.

methods.name: queryHKitSampleType

parameters.name: queryOptions
parameters.docs: defines the type of data and the timeframe which shall be queried, a limit can be set to reduce the number of results.

tags.name: param
tags.text: queryOptions defines the type of data and the timeframe which shall be queried, a limit can be set to reduce the number of results.

methods.docs: This defines a query to the Healthkit for a single type of data.

methods.name: isAvailable
methods.docs: This functions resolves if HealthKitData is available it uses the native HKHealthStore.isHealthDataAvailable() funtion of the HealthKit .

parameters.docs: defines the sample types which can be queried for

methods.docs: This defines a query to the Healthkit for a single type of data. This function has not been tested.

methods.name: isEditionAuthorized

parameters.name: queryOptions
parameters.docs: defines the sampletype for which you need to check for writing permission.

tags.name: param
tags.text: queryOptions defines the sampletype for which you need to check for writing permission.

methods.docs: Checks if there is writing permission for one specific sample type. This function has not been tested.

methods.name: multipleIsEditionAuthorized

interfaces.name: AuthorizationQueryOptions
interfaces.docs: Used for authorization of reading and writing access.

interfaces.name: QueryOutput
interfaces.docs: This interface is used for any results coming from HealthKit. It always has a count and the actual results.

interfaces.name: SingleQueryOptions
interfaces.docs: This extends the Basequeryoptions for a single sample type.

interfaces.name: MultipleQueryOptions
interfaces.docs: This extends the Basequeryoptions for a multiple sample types.

interfaces.name: EditionQuery
interfaces.docs: This is used for checking writing permissions.
